Yetr2: for a normal user I always just say make one big partition.  these days hard disks just tend to fail totally
Yetr2: I haven't recently seen just a partition die.  filesystem corruption just doesn't happen much anymore
if you don't think you'll need more than that, make them all primary
to be safe I always make 3 primary then the 4th extended if I need to
